marketinginformation: Don't Let a Little Water or Sand Stand Between You And Great Video. Discover Toshiba's Camileo Bw10 Full HD Waterproof Camcorder, Offering The Versatility And Resilience You Need to Take Dazzling Full HD Movies-even Under Water. ideal For The Beach, Camping, Sailing And More, This Hardy Go-anywhere Companion Records Stunning 1080p Full HD up to Six And a Half Feet or 2 Meters Under Water, While Keeping The Outside Elements From Spoiling Your Shot-and Your Fun.
